name: Mayday (itch) (veack_itchio)
description:
You have to go as far as possible but your Rocket is falling apart and you have to maintain all the module manually.

Rocket: 

Dodge meteorites "A" to move to the left / "D" to move to the right

Pressure module: 

Keep the needle in the green
Left click + drag to move the needle to the left / Right click + drag to move the needle to the right

Temperature module:

 Keep the temperature between 5° and 40°
"Up" to heat up / "Down" to cool down

Battery module: 

"Space" multiple time to charge battery
Don't go further than 2 green leds

Led modules: 

Click to change color The 4 leds must have the same colors

Terminal:

 Give instructions and questions
"Y" or "N" to answer questions
